title: A Christmas Morning
description: “A Christmas morning” is a nice and kind Christmas poem / verse / story for children by Clifton Bingham (1859–1913). This book was firstly published by Raphael Tuck & Sons in 1890.This book tells children about a Christmas Day and some winter traditions: plays, games and sports.The ‘Animedia Company’ e-book edition (2012) contains the original illustrations of children at play, including a very nice picture of a young boy in a kilt, which were carefully restored by a publisher.
author: Clifton Bingham
